sofas.name: Sofas
sofas.discription: Durable metal springs in the seat give the sofa a springy comfort, allowing you to sit, relax and enjoy it for many years.

table.name: table
table.disription: Under this sturdy coffee table’s table top there is an equally big shelf. Perfect for magazines, remotes and other things you want close by when relaxing on the sofa. Part of the NODELAND furniture series.

curtains.name: Curtains
curtains.discription: With block-out blinds you won’t get your sleep disturbed by moonlight and street lights - or be woken by the sun when you want to sleep in late.
